name: Neon Infinite
description:
The CEO of the Universal Electric Consortium has decided to increase the price of the light a 1000% As a result, all the people had been forced to turn off the lights. But the CEO had a master plan: For years the neon lights the people had been installing on their houses had a routine prepared to force the people to turn the lights on! 

If not, they will die.

Lucky us the neon light from the arcade doesn't work as expected...

3 LEVELS!!!!

4 BOSSES!!!!

An engaging story based on real events (the increase of the electric bill in Spain, this summer). 

So yeah, I made this game cause I'm quite angry, :D

Controls
  • W, A, S, D, or GamePad left stick: Movement
  • Mouse left button or GamePad A button: shoot
  • Mouse right button or GamePad B button: bomb
Power-Ups
  • S: Single Shoot
  • M: Multiple shoots (thanks to two ships that come to help you)
  • L: Laser shoot. Faster, and can kill multiple enemies at the same time
  • B: An extra bomb
  • +: An extra life
